author: D Kechagias
content:
Very popular place, their classic 3 curries on rice is some of the best Indian in town, while being inexpensive. It's also very fast to serve, given the simple concept. Hard to choose a favourite among the options.
Be aware that there are no mild curries, they all have some kick, but they do start from reasonable levels of spiciness.
You can take our or sit in one of the long communal tables.
